text: {"answer": "A", "reasoning": "i true (business-related taxes of all levels deductible if not income/profit taxes); ii false (gratisaktien from Kapitaleinlagereserven exempt from Emissionsabgabe per StAG Art. 10 Abs. 2); iii false (dualistic system: private real estate gains only GTG, not always income tax); iv false (privileged Warenreserve recognizable in Steuerbilanz without Handelsbilanz booking); v false (allocation in KG based on overall criteria, sachenrecht not preeminently decisive)."}
